sentence: A new report from the Associated Press sheds disturbing new light on the troubled past of Trump-endorsed Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker.
author: Brad Reed
title: Newly unearthed records show Trump-endorsed candidate talked 'about having a shootout with police'

sentence: We are very proud of the man Herschel Walker has become, Diane McKnight, Deans mother, said in a statement provided by Walkers campaign.
title: Police records complicate Herschel Walker's recovery story

sentence: It was updated on Feb. 11, 2022, to make clear that U.S. Senate candidate Herschel Walkers therapist, Jerry Mungadze, holds a doctorate of philosophy in counselor education.
author: BRIAN SLODYSKO
title: Police records complicate Herschel Walker's recovery story
